mapper.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, A.PRODUCT_NAME, B.MANUFACTURER, B.PRICE, B.EXPIRATION_DATE, B.PRODUCT_KIND_NO, B.PRODUCT_KIND_NAME, A.BRAND_NO, B.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, B.STORED_FILE_NAME, B.DEL_CHECK, A.SALE_QUANTITY purchase_count from POPULARITY_PRODUCT_VIEW A JOIN PRODUCT_VIEW B ON (A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE A.BRAND_NO = 2 AND ROWNUM <= 5 AND DEL_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY SALE_QUANTITY DESC, PRODUCT_NO ASC
select * from product_view where brand_no = #{brand_no} and del_check = 'N' order by product_no asc
